description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources for effective advocacy and partnerships on child rights issues with stakeholders., which contributes to Child Protection â€“ General, Human Rights Institutions, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Private Sector Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, child-related national policies, budgets and systems, including the child protection system, are inclusive and equity- focused.

description.narrative: UNICEF Mongolia has continued to build and expand partnerships with the private sector in 2021. Besides continuing to advocate the CRBP and Family-Friendly Policies among businesses, UNICEF has been working towards developing enabling environment. In this respect, we work with the policymakers and business associations as a member of their working groups and committees to produce policy commitments and legal acts guiding child rights;responsible business conduct. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:16/12/2021
